summary: This document contains resolutions from JEGE LLC authorizing Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas to manage various accounts on behalf of the company. It outlines the powers granted to authorized signers, including Jeffrey Epstein, and the responsibilities of the bank in relation to these accounts.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is listed as an authorized signer for JEGE LLC, granting him powers to manage the company's accounts with Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Darren Indke
persons.context: Darren Indke is mentioned as another authorized signer for JEGE LLC, alongside Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: Both individuals are authorized signers for JEGE LLC, allowing them to manage the company's accounts.

keyFacts: The document certifies the resolutions of JEGE LLC regarding the management of accounts with Deutsche Bank.
Jeffrey Epstein is named as an authorized signer for the company, allowing him to manage its financial accounts.
Darren Indke is also listed as an authorized signer, indicating a partnership in managing the company's financial affairs.
The document outlines the powers granted to authorized signers, including the ability to delegate authority.
The resolutions confirm that the bank can rely on the instructions of the authorized signers unless notified otherwise.
